includes.expression: [[Container.Content(movies) + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomMovieSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomMovieSectionSlideshow)]] | [[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomTVSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomTVSectionSlideshow)]] | [Container.PlexContent(homemovies) + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomHomeVideoSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomHomeVideoSectionSlideshow)]] | [[Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomMusicSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomMusicSectionSlideshow)]] | [[Container.PlexContent(photos) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomPhotoSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomPhotoSectionSlideshow)]] | [[Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomChannelSectionBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomChannelSectionSlideshow)]] | [Container.Content(clips) + ![Skin.HasSetting(CustomWatchLaterBackground) | Skin.HasSetting(CustomWatchLaterSlideshow)]]]

animation.condition: [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | $EXP[NewFilters] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

onleft.condition: ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums) | $EXP[NewFilters]

item.visible: ![!IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) | !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(OptionsMenu)) | !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] + [![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photoalbums) | Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | $EXP[NewFilters]]]

item.label: $LOCALIZE[42369]
item.visible: [[Container.Content(movies) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(Filter.Type),homemovies)] | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(songs)] + !Skin.HasSetting(Disable.LowListView)

item.label: $LOCALIZE[31078]
item.visible: [[Container.Content(movies) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(Filter.Type),homemovies)] | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(songs)] + !Skin.HasSetting(Disable.TriPanelView)

control.visible: [[ControlGroup(200).HasFocus + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] | [!IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(OptionsMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu))] | [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | $EXP[NewFilters] | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]] + !ControlGroup(1130).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(1132).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(300).HasFocus + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(VideoExtrasMenu)) + IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(ViewTypeMenu))

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(50) + ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photos)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(51) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(57) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.description: Change Small Icons Watched Status Colour
control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
$LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(511)] + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photos)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(503) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.description: Change Fullscreen Wall Watched Status Colour
control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(609) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]
